'''Gertie''' is the wife of [[Saul]].

==History==
When Gertie learned her husband, Saul, had died while in hospice care, she rushed over to the facility where he was to say her goodbyes. She gave him a quick kiss and then left, saying she and Saul had promised each other that the end was the end.

==Relationships==
===Romantic===
She was married to [[Saul]] until his death. Despite this, she was aware of his long-term relationship with [[Daniel Schwartz]], but chose to look the other way.
